name: Midnight Acres
description:
Midnight Acres was built using Unreal Engine 5 and features a beautiful and dynamic day and night system.
Daytime Gameplay

During the daytime, build and expand your farm and engage in casual and relaxing building & management.
Gather resources to upgrade your farm and defenses.
Relax by exploring the world for treasures, fishing in various ponds and underground lakes, managing your farm, and more!

Nighttime Gameplay

When night falls, you must push back hordes of enemies trying to destroy you and your farm.
Engage in intense FPS combat with various weapons.
Use tower-defense elements to place and upgrade turrets and defenses for your farm.
Exploration

Explore a vast world with a sprawling cave system and rare collectibles... but beware.
Monsters constantly patrol the underground and guard the most valuable treasures.
